Tests shifted breakpoint.
Set enabled breakpoint close to shifted location
breakpoint at 29
Remove breakpoint
Set disabled breakpoint close to shifted location
breakpoint at 25 disabled
Remove breakpoint
Set enabled breakpoint far away from shifted location
breakpoint at 29
Remove breakpoint
Set disabled breakpoint far away from shifted location
breakpoint at 19 disabled
Remove breakpoint
Set breakpoint after script end
Set two breakpoints with the same shifted line
breakpoint at 29
Remove breakpoint
